original_text: The portico was twenty cubits wide, and twelve cubits from front to back. It was reached by a flight of stairs, and there were pillars on each side of the jambs.
korean_text: 그 현관의 너비는 스무 척이요 길이는 열한 척이며 문간으로 올라가는 층계가 있고 문 벽 곁에는 기둥이 있는데 하나는 이쪽에 있고 다른 하나는 저쪽에 있더라

sentences.original_text: The portico was twenty cubits wide
and twelve cubits from front to back
It was reached by a flight of stairs
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 계단을 통해 올라갈 수 있었으며

sentences.original_text: and there were pillars on each side of the jambs
